website_summaries.verdict: Trendy, stylish matte finish helmet with a glossy front vent that’s suitable for schooling or competition.
pros: This design gets lots of nods for its trendy design and particularly comfortable quick release chin strap
2 snap out, machine washable liners means you can always have a fresh-feeling helmet
Streamlined, low profile appearance and a secure fit
cons: Some found the prominent logo placement offputting

customer_reviews.title: I love IRH helmets!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is wonderful. Just like I expected since I’ve worn this brand almost exclusively since I was a kid. Fast shipping, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amers425

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Chinstrap
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the look and color (navy) of this helmet. She was replacing an IRH helmet that went missing at the stables. The problem with this helmet is the strap. There is velcro on one side of the head that the strap with Velcro to adjust can't possibly reach. So you've got Velcro on the strap under your chin. It's scratchy, stiff and uncomfortable. Nothing like the helmet we were replacing. Very disappointing. Waiting for UPS to pick it up now for return.
customer_reviews.author: Dooberhead

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I tried on so many helmets at a local tack store and none fit as good as this one. It comes down around your head and really stays on. It doesn't give you a big bulky mushroom look like the Charles Owen ones do. It's light and keeps my head well ventilated. It looks as stylish as the much more expensive Samshields. I bought the velvety looking version with a shiny vent and am very happy with it. After a friend saw mine, she bought the matte version with a matte vent, and she loves hers too.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughters 4th IRH helmet. E we absolutely love the brand. They last forever. We try to replace her helmets every other year even though they still look Brand new. She honestly still has her IRA Helmer’s we bought 8 years ago and it still looks good. She wears it still when she is just working on the farm or moving horses in and out of the barn. Great helmet and great price. The matte is by far her favorite one.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Dendy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, stylish and affordable helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet for an oval head. Very affordable compared to my previous Charle Owen helmet and MUCH lighter. Does resemble One K but again more affordable. Great for daily riding but nice enough to show in and still look good. I love the liner that has lots of padding and it even came with another replacement liner. I ride in 100 degree heat and the light weight vented top is much better than my Charles Owen. I love this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Look and Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last minute for a show as I did not have a tipperary helmet, that I have always worn, that was holding up and in good condition. This helmet looked great and held up. It is comfortable and the chin strap is easy to adjust. I looked good and felt good wearing it. I have a new go to helmet now.
customer_reviews.author: Leopold

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it far too round for my noggin...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this helmet, but quickly discovered my head is too oval for this helmet. I wish it had worked as it’s very sleek & more streamlined than many helmets, but the pressure on my forehead was too much, so I sprung for a one K defender in oval which was double the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lainey S

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: She loves this helmet because it is very comfortable and stylish. I like it because it came with 2 pads that are washable.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Light weight. Keeps you from sweating. Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: This helmet has been great. I ordered two for my daughters. They like them so much better than their others. They keep their heads less sweaty. They can fit their hair up in them with no problem. The helmets are shoe certified and they are light weight.
customer_reviews.author: bes

customer_reviews.title: Not a good idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought this helmet in October of 2018 so less then 1 year old it has never been in a fall or dropped it was in a car with windows down it is collapsing in the center and separating. There is no option to return it on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Have gotten so many complements on this helmet. Cheaper than a Samshield but looks nice enough to be a good alternative. Removable lining and ventilation are wonderful when riding three of more horses everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Keara

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting helmet I've ever had. Haven't invested in a helmet for 20 years . Love the interchangeable lining for cleaning. Very comfortable fit. I signed up for an Amazon credit card and was able to use the $50 gift certificate to reduce the price. Now I have it I and know what it is like I would have paid full price and still been very happy. My head has always been difficult to fit for a helmet . Thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Baker

customer_reviews.title: I took very good care of it so it had nothing to do ...
customer_reviews.text: This helmet did not hold up. I question if it is a knockoff. The logo fell off in just a couple weeks and the straps cracked not too soon after. I took very good care of it so it had nothing to do with that. Poor quality. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet, bad chin strap design...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice-looking helmet for the price – loved the matte black and it fit comfortably on my head. However, I returned it because the chin strap was very uncomfortable. The long strip of velcro makes the strap stiff and the whole harness sits far forward on your face. I kept trying to pull it back, but ultimately decided it wasn't worth it. I bought a Charles Owen Ayrbrush after I returned this and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value and looks great, even in the show ring! Really love how it fits my head, and I'm protected for anything that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable riding helmet
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what was advertised. This is a replacement for a damaged helmet of the same model - helmet is very comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Horse Colonel

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and looks fancy
customer_reviews.text: I can't justify spending hundreds of dollars on a OneK or Charles Owen, but this IRH looks just as sharp, is super comfortable, and was more in the budget. SO happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Adnama384

customer_reviews.title: This helmet is amazing! My husband and I both have one
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is amazing! My husband and I both have one. Fit is spot on, durable and stylish for schooling or at shows. (Dressage riders here)
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Other than that this helmet is really comfortable and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: The logo on my helmet is off-center, and the ear straps aren't even on both sides. A little disappointing, but nothing I can't deal with. Other than that this helmet is really comfortable and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I measured my head and ordered per those measurements and this helmet is a perfect fit and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gandert

customer_reviews.title: Love this helmet
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet! Super comfortable, fit well as my previous IRH helmets have in the past. This is a great option if you aren't wanting to drop a ton of $$ for the pricier brands. I did end up purchasing a helmet bag to go with this to help keep the matte plastic from scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne H

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you buy a size that is big enough for your pony tail to fit inside!
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: Love this helmet!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't make me look like a mushroom head and it's super comfortable. Also looks very stylish and as nice as more expensive helmets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet but didn't fit my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! Very comfortable! Perfect fit for my daughter who had a hard time finding a comfortable helmet. Her head is wide and most helmets rub the sides of her forehead and back of her head. We're so glad we found this one. Seems like a much more expensive helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Frances G

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is super nice and is really pretty and coverable. Iwaer it all the time and love it for shows and schooling!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barnstormer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent helmet
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, super comfortable, does not make you look like a bucket head. Nice-so you will actually wear it!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Swords

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helmet!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this helmet! I have tried 3 different brands/styles and this one hands down is the best! So comfortable & light weight. The changeable liners make it like a custom fit. It is also at a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: bdladd

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove. At last I found a fitting helmet. Pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Katharina Livia Harer

customer_reviews.title: They are a essential for safety while riding and why not look good also.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her helmet. She wears this one in competition and has another for practice. They are a essential for safety while riding and why not look good also.
customer_reviews.author: Hutch

customer_reviews.title: IRH 4G Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet! I have had a difficult time finding one that fits my head just right, and this one fixed the issue. The low profile is also a big plus. I can’t wait to wear it at my next show!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looks and fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the IRH helmets for their fit and show ring looks. My son and I both wear the IRH helmets. I got this one for my son as the Matte finish doesn't show the dirt when he absent mindedly sets it down on the barn floor.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Creveling

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice fitting and nice looking helmet with lots of padding!
customer_reviews.author: Laura A

customer_reviews.title: Fit and safety
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife,she loves it.confortable fit stylish design.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES M SAUNDERS

customer_reviews.title: Love this helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, love the interchangeable liners. Perfect for schooling. Comfortable and stylish. Looks very similar to a Samshield. The only thing is that I wish the chin strap got a little longer
customer_reviews.author: Alex Belton

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a lot of cushion for more tailored fit
customer_reviews.text: Looks very sporty. Experienced some tightness with all the interior cushion so I had to cut some of the fluff out and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Mariella

customer_reviews.title: Great but!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! So many compliments, so comfortable, great price!!! I’ve had several friends purchase it bc they loved the look and the fit.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Savings
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Same product for a lot less money. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable, stylish, and I'm not as worried about head injures should I fall or be bucked off.
customer_reviews.author: Aelsar

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and stylish at half the price of a samshield or one k! have been wearing for month and love it! Happy to have found a nice helmet that fits my round head.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Tursi

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet is such great quality would highly recommend!!! It is similar to a One-k
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Campion

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this helmet. It’s super comfy. Helmets tend to hurt my forehead. Also pretty low profile, I look silly in a lot of helmets that stick up way high above my head. Don’t even know it’s there.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING HELMET FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING HELMET FOR THE PRICE! I'm so obsessed with this purchase. This looks like a 600 dollar helmet and was a fraction of the price. Such a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable helmet and looks sharp! Saved money on my purchase for great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: IRH helmet was bought used and I was extremely surprised and happy that it is like new. Looks as though it's never been used. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Lummus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing helmet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this helmet! It’s beautiful and great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: I love this helmet! It is comfortable and adds just enough bling with the shiny vent on the front.
customer_reviews.author: Staci D Yates

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great for round heads
customer_reviews.text: After a bit of minor surgery on the padding (my head must be too round) it fits very well. Good helmet for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin McLimans

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and value
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, two inserts for fit, all good for the $
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Kaspar

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet. I have two. Very flattering and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! Fits perfectly and looks like the much more expensive brands but a fraction of the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Natalya Dobias

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful helmet. You would have never ever guessed it was used!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: I love this helmet , it looks great , super easy to clean both the exterior and the inside padding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been on he lookout for a new helmet for schooling and love the IRH helmets, but they’re usually more expensive than I’d like for a schooling helmet. Saw this go on sale for my size and so I ordered it. I’m SO glad I did. The interchangeable and washable liners are an amazing feature and this helmet is definitely nice enough to show in as well (hunter/jumper and dressage in my case). Would absolutely buy again even at regular price.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet! Perfect for price for fancy looking high quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Completely wrong helmet
customer_reviews.text: The helmet that came was not the one pictured. It was a cheap plastic low quality bicycle looking helmet. I would never feel safe getting on a horse in it. It was also blue not black. Do not purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Style vs Fit
customer_reviews.text: Stylish helmet but sizing was weird. It fit a lot different than the IRH my daughter had. After trying three different sizes we had to try a different style helmet.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I had a One K and absolutely hated how it fit my head, plus it felt too heavy and bulky. This helmet is similar in style but soooo much more comfortable and the price is fantastic. I’ve gotten compliments on it at the barn. It comes with two different padding inserts - one is thicker and one is thinner so you can further customize the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

product_meta.title: IRH 4G Helmet with Interchangable Comfort/Sizing Liners
feature_bullets: 2 snap-in liners made with hi-tech, fast drying cool-on fabric provide a custom fit. Removable and machine washable
Maximum ventilation ports to keep the rider cool
Approved by current sei and ASTM standard testing
